titles.title: Tanning Bed Cancer Control Act of 2011
To help prevent the occurrence of cancer resulting from the use of ultraviolet tanning lamps by imposing more stringent controls on the use of such devices, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E778-779)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
